original_text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb, The dog is turned to his own vomit again; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire.
korean_text: 참된 속담에 이르기를 개가 그 토하였던 것에 돌아가고 돼지가 씻었다가 더러운 구덩이에 도로 누웠다 하는 말이 그들에게 응하였도다

sentences.original_text: But it is happened unto them
The dog is turned to his own vomit again
sentences.korean_translation: 개가 자기 토한 것을 다시 먹으러 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: and the sow that was washed
to her wallowing in the mire
